****************************************************************			
******Source file for SPARCS Configuration**********************			
******Lines beginning with stars are comment lines *************			
****************************************************************			
*** SPARCS Settings.txt file for DPWA-AGW (Dubai Port World - Antwerp Gateway)			
****************************************************************			
****************************************************************			
*** Final cleanup needed: alpha sort and removing commented out settings. Refer to revision history.			
****************************************************************			
*** Revision History ***			
****************************************************************			
*** Date-----	Name---		Description-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*** 01.28.08 	R.Patel 	Added settings ALLOCL ALLOCR changed from default. Added CPOS for delivery allocation for containers with CLCQ='Y' for yard.	
*** 01.28.08 	R.Patel 	Added DRVRPL. DRVRPL added to allow CHE operator to create a plan for any MTY container by typing container number in CHE screen. 	
*** 02.25.08 	R.Patel 	Added VS1LDQ. VS1LDQ added to create only one WQ for barge discharge/load	
*** 02.25.08 	R.Patel 	Added CNFNDL CNFNDR CNRCHG Container Find Dialog Settings added to allow other searcg attributes to be added	
*** 02.25.08 	R.Patel 	Settings file cleanup: Commented out settings that values cannot be adjusted for
*** 02.25.08 	R.Patel	Settings file cleanup: Adjusted field lengths for #CLASS PREF and DSGP cannot be adjusted
*** 02.25.08	R.Patel	Added Attributes DPRT and LPRT and set field length value to 5. Reference ARGO-9443
*** 03.06.08	R.Patel	BRGLDL added and set to N for specific barge planning for load list
*** 03.06.08	R.Patel	WQXLEN changed to N
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added ASCLRK from solo testing
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added CPLUSC 
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added CRANHC
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added CUBNDL CUDMDL CUDMGE CUGRPC CURFRD CURFRP CURFRS CURFRT CUSEAL
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added DRVRSA to allow putting aside of containers during rehandles by CHE
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added ECRFCN from solo testing. Description of this setting not found in SPARCS Settings Available extrace from 1.5.H. Requires attention
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added ECRTGS
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added F1LIFT F1PARK F1TRAN
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added FRKDEC
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added HCCRLN to allow discharge to crane lane
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added LODLST from solo testing
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added RDTVAL. RDT Login Validation set to LOOSE
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added REFINE to allow CHE driver to use F6 to request SPARCS to send a new cntr position. 
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added RHNDLV RHNDLY ROADV1 from solo testing.
*** 03.13.08	R.Patel	Added SHRPRJ to allow for shared projections
*** 03.14.08	R.Patel	Removed (Commented Out for now) SHRPRJ. Found SHRPRJ in the SPARCS Settings.txt settings file, but it's no longer supported.
*** 03.14.08	R.Patel	Removed (Commented Out for now) CRANHC CUDMDL ECRFCN FRKDEC LODLST RDTVAL due to notices warnings. Access to setting restricted - default setting value remains in effect.
*** 03.14.08	R.Patel	Settings file cleanup required for commented out settings at future date. Keeping settings now incase licensed features in settings.xml make the setting conficurable at a later date. 
*** 03.19.08	R.Patel	Added ROADTL, set to 'Y' to allow Truck License to be used rather than BAT number in RDT screens and Sparcs for the From/To position of cntr for gate transactions
*** 03.19.08	R.Patel	Adjusted icon id for logical block BR to 33 so it is visible in Sparcs Client.
*** 05.06.08	R.Patel	Added GRAD attribute for Equipment Grade
*** 05.06.08	R.Patel	Added JBSS attribute for Job step State
*** 08.08.08	DKGupta	Added INBTRN for separate inbound and outbound rail visit.
*** 08.26.08	Z.Pandjou	Remove INBOUND and OUTBOUND rail logical blocks
*** 09.04.08	Z.Pandjou	Added SCRDIR setting
*** 12.11.08   	Z.Pandjou	Added ISHZ to ALLOCR
*** 12.11.08	Z.Pandjou	Added Park1 and Park2 logical block
*** 01.16.09 	Z.Pandjou	Added RDACTV setting and set it to 8				
*** 01.23.09	Z.Pandjou	Added GRAD attribute to Allocation filter window				
*** 01.26.09	Z.Pandjou	Added PRGATE Setting and set RDACTV to 0				
*** 02.06.09	J.Leholm	Added Logical block for interfacility transfers: ITRM	GCS	IFT_GCS	27	
*** 02.11.09	D.K. Gupta	Modified the value of ACRR	 from 10 to 17			
*** 02.17.09	Z.Pandjou	Added PLNSTL setting				
*** 02.27.09	Z.Pandjou	Added CONSEQ setting and turned it to Y				
*** 03.16.09	K.Willems	changed the fields of CNRCHG to DPRT SPCD COMD IMOC HPOS OVDM FGHT LNTH				
*** 03.16.09	K.Willems	deleted the LOG BLOK lane park1				
*** 03,18,09	K.Willems	created log blok lane park 1 again				
*** 03.24.09	D.K. Gupta	Added DAMGYC to record damages

#SETTINGS	Code	May Change	Value	Description
	ACTVEC	Y	Y	Only ACTIVE (blue) queues work with EC.
	ALLOCL	Y	EQID EQTP SPCD IMOC COMD LOPR DSGP DMOD AMOD STAT ACRR CLCQ CPOS GRAD	Fields to be put on left side of Allocation Filter Edit dialog.
	ALLOCR	Y	ISRF ISHZ ISFL ISOG ISDM ISHC SRVC CTGY QWGT RLSE MXTR FLWA FIRE	Fields to be put on right side of Allocation Filter Edit dialog.
	ARCLIC	Y	Y	AR Click in allocation window flows selected containers (DARs only). Admin-no-change
	ASCLRK	Y	Y	May assign clerk to a POW
	ATOSTK	Y	Y	"Enable ""AutoStack"" - automatically assign containers to slot specific positions. Admin-no-change"
	BGWQNM	Y	Housekeeping	Name of Background Queue and Pow
	BANOTE	Y	Y	Can attach bay notes. Admin-change-ok
	BERTHI	Y	VAOP VLEN VSTB VETA VETD VSTW VBRZ VCLS VCOD VCUT VDRF VEBT VEMS VGNT VOYI VOYO	Berth Schedule Available Fields (Release 2.2k)
	BLKNAM	Y	Y	Accepts block name as yard position from host (usually redundant). Admin-no-change
	BRGLDL	Y	N	Include Container on Barge Load list if Discharge Port matches the Barge's Service
***	CALCST	N	Y	Can calculate stability
	CNRCHG	Y 	DPRT SPCD IMOM ODMA ODMF ODMH ODML ODMR FHGT LNTH DCRR RLSE CONS NOTE	Attributes that signal the change flag
	CLFONT	N	TIMES	Client font for name. Admin-no-change
	CLNAME	N	DPW Antwerp AGW	Client name. Admin-no-change
	CLSTYL	N	italic	Client style for name. Admin-no-chang	
	CNFNDL	Y	EQID EQTP CTGY DPRT ACRR DCRR LOPR SPCD COMD DSGP BKNG CLCQ YBLK USRB VRFY	Fields to be put on left side of Container Find Filter Edit dialog.	
	CNFNDR	Y	ISPR ISHZ ISRF ISFL ISOG ISPL ISDM ISVR RLSE QWGT FLCQ GRAD FIRE ISBD NOTE	Fields to be put on right side of Container Find Filter Edit dialog.	
	CNRCHG	Y	DPRT DCRR SPCD IMOM UNNS ODMA ODMF ODMH ODML ODMR FHGT LNTH RLSE NOTE	Fields SPARCS will check to determine if a container should be marked as changed.
	CONNUM	N	N	Display sequence number for confirm. Admin-no-change	
	CONSTO	N	N	For stow plan & sequence printing treat confirmed containers as completed. Admin-no-change	
	CONSEQ	Y	Y	All containers in a work queue are sequenced continously regardless of length.	
	CPLUSC	Y	Y	RDT displays container and chassis in chassis inventory pgrm	
***	CRANHC	Y	Y	Crane activities allowed to be entered from hatch clerk	
	CUBNDL	Y	Y	Host receives Container bundling events.	
***	CUDMDL	Y	Y	Host receives Damage detail changes.	
	CUDMGE	Y	Y	Host receives Damage code changes.	
	CUGRPC	Y	Y	Host receives Group changes.	
	CURFRD	Y	Y	Host receives Reefer Details changes.	
	CURFRP	Y	Y	Host receives Reefer Plug changes.	
	CURFRS	Y	Y	Host receives Reefer State changes.	
	CURFRT	Y	Y	Host receives Reefer Temperature changes.
	CUSEAL	Y	Y	Host receives Seal Number changes.
	DAMGYC	Y	Y	Allow user to record damage from the inventory screen
	DELREF	Y	Y	Can delete allocation ranges with active work instructions (NTL=N, others = Y). Admin-change-ok
	DRVRPL	Y	Y	CHE Operator: may press F15 to generate plans for unplanned containers.
	DRVRSA	Y	Y	Top-picks and Reachstackers can set aside rehandles while digging. (Requires DRV
	DSPDCH	Y	BOTH	Truck Control dispatches discharge. NONE, CLERKS, VESSEL, RAIL or BOTH. No effec
	DUPBIN	Y	Y	Host can send duplicate bins - use most detailed bin (Folow Yard Compiler recomm
	ECOPMD	Y	Y	CHEs operating mode can be changed.
***	ECRFCN	Y	Y	
	ECRTGS	Y	Y	Set EC for RTGs. Admin-change-ok
	F1LIFT	Y	Y	Truck may hit enter F1 to confirm cntr lift
	F1PARK	Y	Y	Truck may hit F1 to confirm cntr park
	F1TRAN	Y	Y	Truck may hit F1 to confirm load to train
***	FRKDEC	Y	Y	Use fork decking logic (if block type is 'F' (from yard source file, then top lift can not drive over containers to fill available slots)). Admin-change-ok
***	GTDFNL	N	TRNS EQID EQTP CTGY STAT DCRR BKNG DPRT DEST LOPR SHPR	
***	GTDFNR	N	TRKL QWGT COMD IMOC TEMP SPCD ODMH ODMR ODML RMRK RFTP	
***	GTRRCL	N	ACRR EQID EQTP CTGY STAT DCRR BKNG DPRT DEST LOPR SHPR	
***	GTRRCR	N	RCID QWGT COMD IMOC TEMP SPCD ODMH ODMR ODML RMRK RFTP	
***	GTPRAL	N	EQID EQTP CTGY STAT DCRR BKNG DPRT DEST LOPR SHPR	
***	GTPRAR	N	QWGT COMD IMOC TEMP SPCD ODMH ODMR ODML RMRK RFTP	
	HCCRLN	Y	Y	Hatch clerk may discharge cntr to crane lane
	HCTWIN	Y	Y	Hatch clerk may record twin-lift operations.
	INBTRN	Y	N	Has separate inbound and outbound rail visits.
	ICON40	Y	Y	Show small 4 for 40 ft containers on small icon. Admin-change-ok
	INCPHO	Y	Y	Include portholes in reefer work list.
	KILLAG	N	N	Delelte Allocation Group when all Allocation Ranges are deleted. Admin-change-ok
	KILLAR	N	N	Delete Allocation Range when all member containers are deleted. Admin-change-ok
	LIFTSC	Y	876	SCs lift up to 876
***	LODLST	Y	Y	Can modifiy the load list.
***	LSHSLD	N	Y	Has lashing dialog.
***	LSHTGL	N	Y	Turn on menu item if user turned off. Lashing toggle.
	MOVLOK	Y	Y	Can reallocate locked moves to different slots in the same location (usually ship discharge). Admin-change-ok
	MULTYD 	Y	N	Has multiple straddle exchange areas
	OVRSTO	Y	Y	Do overstow checking.
	OVRLEN	Y	Y	Planner may override alert when planning a container that does not match project
	OVRRTE	Y	Y	Planner may override alert when planning container for vessel it is not routed f
	OVRSTP	Y	Y	Planner may override stop sign.
	OVRVST	Y	Y	Planner may override vessel yellow stop sign.
	PLNSTL	Y	WAGON	Suitable for single tier single platform case
	POWMOD	N	STOP MANU TRCK AUTO
	PRCRED	Y	Y	PrimeRoute: Calculate the row entry directions (i.e.,'LOW' or 'HIGH') by logical	Admin
	PRGATE	Y	Y	
	PRNXBX	Y	Y	Print X instead of gray on container icons in stow, scan, and sequence reports.
	PRRCOL	Y	Y	Print recap reports in color.
	PRTEMP	Y	Y	Stow plans will print empty RoStow sections.
	PRTSST	Y	Y	Print stack status.
	RDACTV	Y	0	Number of seconds before you activate the job
***	RDTVAL	Y	LOOSE	RDT Login Validation
	REVNUM	Y	Y	Support for revision number on vessel sequence sheets
	REFINE	Y	Y	CHE driver may hit F6 to request new position
	RHNDLV	Y	Y	Rehandles calculated for vessel consolidation moves
	RHNDLY	Y	Y	Rehandles calculated for yard consolidation moves
	ROADTL	Y	Y	Background Road Queue activation: Use Truck License instead of BAT to gather dua
	ROADV1	Y	Y	Receivals before deliveries for each truck
	SASPCD	Y	E.T.R.	Include special stowage in AutoStow
	SCNFRM	Y	Y	Straddle confirmation parameter.
***	SCRDIR	Y	C:\NavisSparcsN4\xps	
***	SHRPRJ	Y	Y	Makes shared projections available. May-not-change
	SCTHCB	Y	E.T.R.	Base Section Factor: High Cube included
	SCDPRT	Y	E.T.R.I.	Base Section Factor: Discharge Port included
	SCARCC	Y	E.T.R.I.	Base Section Factor: Depart Visit included
	SFSPCD	Y	E.R.T.	Base Stacking Factor: Stow Code included
	SCEDTL	Y	CTGY ACRR SCEI
	SCEDTR	Y	LOPR DCRR SRVC STAT
	SFEQTP	Y		
	SHDUMP	Y	Y	Allows dumping of containers into vessel
	SOLOLG	Y	Y	Requires log in	
	SRVCLT	Y	Y	Combined operation mode (for people with 1 machine). Admin-change-ok	
	STRMIX	Y	Y	Does not mix 20's and 40's in the same row	
	STOWOL	Y	Y	Outline to move containers. 	
	TEMPAL	Y	Y	Can modify allocation groups to include a temperature range. Admin-no-change	
	UNLOAD	Y	N	Must use Host to undo a load - cannot plan discharge for loaded container.	
	WQXLEN	Y	N	Separate work queue by length	
	VESPWP	Y	Y	Has pre-defined stowage patterns	
	VS1LDQ	Y	Y	Create one Load Queue and one Discharge Queue for all Barge Moves	
	VERLOA	Y	Y		
**************************************************************

#STOW LOAD	height (mm)	width (mm)				
	20	20				
#OPTIONS	inc. moments	english	sep. lengths	comb.Decks	labels	met. Tonnes
	N	N	N	N	Y	Y
#FONT SET	set number	font	size			
	1	Courier	12			
	2	Arial Black	13			
#FIELDS	categories	just	vert. offset	font set		
	SLOT	L	17	1

	DPLO	L	76	2		
	CON2	R	95	2

	FHGT	R	76	1

* BEGIN RECAP REPORT DEFINITIONS							
**************************************************************							
#RECAP	Name	Row Totals	Column Totals	Weight Totals	Cell Weights	Half cell line	Chars per Cell
	W/B Recap	Y	Y	N	N	None	5
#RFONTSET	set number	font	size	The first font set will be the one used in the cells			
	1	Helvetica	10				
	2	Times	10				
	3	Helvetica	12				
	4	Times	9				
	5	Times	15				
#RTITLE	Left	left font set	Center	center font set	Right 	right font set	
			Westbound Recap	5			
	ShipNameAndVoyNum	5	By  Load/Disch Ports	5	ShipCode	5	
#RHEADER	Row Head 1	Row Head 2	Col Head 1	Col Head 2	header font set		
	DISCHARGE  PORT		LOAD  PORT		1		
#RCATEGORY	Col or Row	Sort Cat	Display Cat	Border	font set		
	Col	LPRT	LPRT	Bold	3		
	Col	LNTH	LNTH	Solid	4		
	Col	CON2	CON2	Dashed	4		
	Row	DPRT	DPRT	Bold	3		
	Row	DEST	DEST	Solid	4

#RECAP	Name	Row Totals	Column Totals	Weight Totals	Cell Weights	Half cell line	Chars per Cell
	finalStow Recap	Y	Y	N	N	None	7
#RFONTSET	set number	font	size	The first font set will be the one used in the cells			
	1	Helvetica	10				
	2	Times	10				
	3	Helvetica	12				
	4	Times	9				
	5	Times	15				
#RTITLE	Left	left font set	Center	center font set	Right 	right font set	
				5			
	ShipNameAndVoyNum	5	Stow Recap	5	ShipCode	5	
#RHEADER	Row Head 1	Row Head 2	Col Head 1	Col Head 2	header font set		
	ROW		TYPE		1		
#RCATEGORY	Col or Row	Sort Cat	Display Cat	Border	font set		
	Col	EQTP	EQTP	Solid	3		
	Row	YROW	YROW	Solid	3		
**************************************************************
